title: New Plum Tree Garden Lemonleaf Grill
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Thai, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers a separate vegetarian menu - vegans should call and ask about specific ingredients. Has mock chicken style meat (seitan), mock beef (made from soy), and tofu. The seitan can be ordered in General Tsao sauce or sesame style. Accommodating to special request and substitutions - just ask.
